mapper.select: SELECT fairytale_pk AS fairytalePk, title, count, cover_img_url AS coverImgUrl, first, second, metadata FROM fairytale WHERE fairytale_pk = #{fairytalePk}

SELECT p.progress_pk AS progressPk, p.now_page AS nowPage, p.mode, p.finish, p.role, u.nickname AS friendNickname FROM progress p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.friend_id = u.id WHERE p.fairytale_pk = #{fairytalePk} AND p.user_pk = #{userPk}
